data.name: Happy Puzzle : True Happy

- Add Live2D animated characters with nudity states.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content.
This DLC include Nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
All characters in the game are all over 18 years old.
